extendedInfo.description: Fathers day SMS and E cards: Celebrate fathers day by sending some hearty messages and E-cards to your father from this android app "Fathers day SMS and E cards". A father figure for most of a role model, a real life hero. A person held our hands as we learnt to walk when we were kids and as a mentor in the "walk of life". A mother is a good teacher but, a father is a live example. Lets salute our father, and celebrate this day in their honor. Send them beautiful sms and  e- cards as a token of love and  express yourself, that you care for him. Some times we run out of words to express. Not any more with this android app. Download this "fathers day SMS and E cards app" for this fathers day. Wishes on fathers day.
